name: Suzuki Alto VX
description: The Suzuki Alto VX is an affordable and compact hatchback, perfect for city driving. With a seating capacity of 4 and manual transmission, it is ideal for small families or individuals seeking an economical ride.

name: Suzuki Alto VXR
description: The Suzuki Alto VXR offers excellent fuel efficiency, making it a great option for budget-conscious drivers. With its manual transmission and compact design, it's an excellent choice for both urban and suburban driving.

name: Suzuki Every VX
description: The Suzuki Every VX is a spacious minivan that comfortably seats up to 7 people, making it an excellent choice for family trips or group outings. Its larger fuel capacity and practical design ensure long drives are comfortable and economical.

name: Suzuki Cultus VXR
description: The Suzuki Cultus VXR is a reliable hatchback, offering great value for those looking for efficiency and style. Its 5-seater capacity makes it ideal for small families or commuters, and the fuel-efficient engine ensures a smooth driving experience.

name: Suzuki Wagon R VXR
description: The Suzuki Wagon R VXR is a spacious and practical hatchback designed for those who need more room without compromising on style or performance. With a 5-seater capacity and manual transmission, it's perfect for everyday commutes and long drives.

name: Suzuki Swift GL
description: The Suzuki Swift GL is a sporty and stylish hatchback that offers excellent driving dynamics and fuel economy. With a 5-seater capacity and manual transmission, it's perfect for those seeking a fun-to-drive car with practical features.

name: Honda Civic 1.8 i-VTEC
description: The Honda Civic 1.8 i-VTEC is a premium sedan offering a blend of luxury and performance. With an automatic transmission and sleek design, it provides a smooth and comfortable ride, making it ideal for long drives or business trips.

name: Honda City 1.5 Aspire
description: The Honda City 1.5 Aspire is a stylish and fuel-efficient sedan that offers a comfortable ride for families and individuals alike. With its automatic transmission and spacious cabin, it’s perfect for city driving and long-distance travel.

name: Toyota Corolla Altis 1.8
description: The Toyota Corolla Altis 1.8 is a premium sedan known for its reliability and advanced features. Its spacious interior and smooth automatic transmission make it a great choice for those seeking comfort, luxury, and a top-notch driving experience.

name: Honda BR-V i-VTEC
description: The Honda BR-V i-VTEC is a spacious and stylish SUV with a 7-seater capacity, making it perfect for family trips and long drives. Its manual transmission and reliable engine ensure a smooth and efficient driving experience.

name: Toyota Fortuner 2.7
description: The Toyota Fortuner 2.7 is a high-performance SUV with luxury features, perfect for those seeking both style and power. With its automatic transmission and large fuel tank, it’s designed for long trips and off-road adventures.

name: Kia Picanto
description: The Kia Picanto is a compact hatchback offering a fun and efficient driving experience. With its automatic transmission and stylish design, it’s ideal for city driving while maintaining excellent fuel economy.
